NFTs and ART are changing how we think about art and ownership.

If you're interested in staying up-to-date on the latest NFT / ART trends, be sure to follow me on social media!

> Follow me (@CyrilCoste) for more

> Retweet the 1st tweet below to share this thread

ART (augmented reality art) is a new type of art that uses technology to create immersive, interactive experiences. 

It's often used to create public art installations or to add digital layers to existing artwork.

Machine learning is more focused on the development of algorithms that can learn from data.

Machine learning is a subset of artificial intelligence that allows computers to learn from data without being explicitly programmed.

The digital transformation drivers in the waste recycling and circular economy market are increasing waste management awareness. 

In parallel, increasing demand for energy and energy cost are driving the demand for waste recycling.

The analytics technology helps waste sorting centers detect fraudulent claims, detect unauthorized waste, and assign waste to appropriate locations.

The smart sorting technology helps sorting centers sort waste based on expected recycling value.

Asset tracking is the most adopted technology in the waste recycling and circular economy market. 

The asset tracking technology helps waste sorting centers track and manage the location of waste and also helps with automated truck loading and unloading.

The digital transformation in the waste recycling and circular economy market is segmented by technology into:

‚úÖ Asset tracking 
‚úÖ Analytics
‚úÖ Smart sorting

The digital transformation in the waste recycling and circular economy market is projected to be $60 billion by 2025.

The analysts forecast the global waste recycling and circular economy market to grow at a CAGR of 7.60% during the period 2017-2025.

//Supply Chain//

5G allows companies to do predictive maintenance and change parts based on real-time information to improve service levels.

//Utilities//

Digital energy grids support efficient and reliable power supply via digital metering solutions and advanced energy meters.
5G enables intelligent transportation systems (ITS) to improve transportation safety, travel reliability, and travel cost efficiency.

These smart city services include applications using the  Internet of things  (IoT) and network access control and integration applications.

5G  provides advanced traffic management and improves public safety, city-wide surveillance,  smart parking, and smart energy systems.

//Video and Virtual Reality//

5G doubles the bandwidth and quadruples the capacity. Consumers can stream video on their phones and 4K resolution VR on laptops and for home entertainment.

The technology and data-intensive industries will benefit significantly from 5G. 

5G will also enable new business models, transforming existing ones. 

Let's have look in more details:

5G‚Äôs potential economic value comes from 3 core factors:

- Capacity for much higher data rates (20 GB/second for peak-line speeds)
- Capacity for much higher network capacity
- Capacity for much higher capacity in terms of wireless access and connectivity.

According to the WEF, the fast, intelligent internet connectivity enabled by 5G technology is expected to create about $12 trillion in global economic value within the next two decades.

The economic potential of 5G is 10x greater than the expected economic potential of 4G.

The golden age of 5G is upon us.

I am often asked what economic value 5G creates and the impact on industries.

Here's an overview of what 5G brings to the table.
